remarks: The infinite sum of positive reals is positive.  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 9-Feb-2008.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2014.)
statement:
isumrpcl.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
isumrpcl.2 $e |- W = ( ZZ>= ` N ) $.
isumrpcl.3 $e |- ( ph -> N e. Z ) $.
isumrpcl.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) = A ) $.
isumrpcl.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> A e. RR+ ) $.
isumrpcl.6 $e |- ( ph -> seq M ( + , F ) e. dom ~~> ) $.
isumrpcl $p |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. W A e. RR+ ) $.
$d F k $.
$d M k $.
$d N k $.
$d W k $.
$d Z k $.
$d k ph $.
